channel.title: clerihew on Will's Whims
channel.description: Recent content in clerihew on Will's Whims

item.title: David Fetcho
item.description: David Fetcho’s no small quelquechose— A modern day Erasmus and occasional Bacchus.

item.title: Idy Kiser
item.description: Idy Clare Kiser Is a kind, wise advisor. Pay attention. She takes her place “Seventy-seven-on-the-top. The Child of Grace.”

item.title: Chris Biemann
item.description: Herr Doktor Biemann’s own graphical models are ausgezeichnet, If you are surmising that yours will do better Likeyanknowjus forgeddaboudit.

item.title: Robert Voyer
item.description: Robert Voyer Shouldn’t be left to wait out in the foyer. (He probably shouts an “¡Olé!” If you pronounced it /fwä-ˌyā/)

item.title: Alexander C. Lipsey
item.description: Alexander C. Lipsey? No, I’ve never seen him tipsy. He’s by no means a drudge– But he is sober as a judge.

item.title: David Fayram, Vicky Willis
item.description: David Fayram — You might want to beware him. His opinions are fearless; His abilities, peerless. Vicky Robbins, née Willis, She was kind when I met her, and she still is. She’s clever as beans And she says what she means.

item.title: Hal Eisen
item.description: Hal Eisen sail’d to the horizon. He’d rather suffer beri-beri than write code that’s proprietary.
